[[Image:Kirinki.jpg: '''Kirinki''' was one of the many species of birds found in [[Númenor]], and doubtless [[Aman]], that were not known in [[Middle-earth]]. The kirinki were said to be smaller than wrens, with bright scarlet feathers, and voices so high that they could hardly be heard by [[Men]].<ref>{{UT
